Jargon Term: help try and prevent further damage to your liver
It is very important not to drink any alcohol.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: You should not use any acetaminophen containing products until your doctor tells you your liver tests have returned to [**Location 213**].
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: We are starting you on oxycodone to help control your pain. You may take one tablet (5 mg) every eight hours. Take a total of three tablets of oxycodone (5 mg) on both Saturday and Sunday. Take two tablets on both Monday and Tuesday. Take one tablet on both Wednesday and Thursday. Never take more than one tablet at a time. Separate each tablet by eight hours. Do not drive or perform any activity that requires mental alertness while taking this medication. If you are feeling well, you can take less tablets.
We gave you a prescription for docusate and senna. These will help you move your bowels while on narcotic pain medications. You do not need to take these if you are moving your bowels regularly.
